Description:
We are looking for an enthusiastic Communications Trainee to manage our external and internal communications. You will promote a positive public image and control the dissemination of information on our company’s behalf.Develop and enhance the company's brand in accordance with the company's internal requirements.
Developing and writing electronic media content such as WhatsApp and email.
Ensure that all communications and marketing materials are in line with brand standards.
Work with communication team to conceptualize and implement communications strategies and campaigns.
Managing and organizing the company's external and internal activities.
Creating promotional and communication videos internally and externally.
Create and design infographics, flyers, posters and presentations as required.Skills
Skills: - The trainee must have a bachelor’s degree in advertising management, marketing, or advertising communications.
- Proficiency in English, spoken and written.
